title: Breakingviews TV: Takeda’s test
text:
Breakingviews TV: Takeda’s test 8:44pm IST - 04:15
The ambitious Japanese drugmaker is closing in on a $64 bln takeover of Irish counterpart Shire. But the sheer size of the deal poses a problem, as Jeff Goldfarb tells Quentin Webb. That means a lot of stock, a fluctuating offer price, and an opening for rival bidders. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The ambitious Japanese drugmaker is closing in on a $64 bln takeover of Irish counterpart Shire. But the sheer size of the deal poses a problem, as Jeff Goldfarb tells Quentin Webb. That means a lot of stock, a fluctuating offer price, and an opening for rival bidders.
